A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good movie. Really enjoyed the plot twists. Different enough from the other Star wars movies to actually be enjoyable and feel fresh. A couple of plot issues were certainly there.... But hey\, nothing is perfect and the story continues to the next generation. Can't understand the bad ratings. Good Star wars movie!!!! But then I like all the Star wars movies. Well\, the prequels weren't the greatest. Thank God these 3 episodes are shaping up nicely.
